head.title: Family & Student Support during COVID-19 - Anderson School District Two

input.name: __VIEWSTATE

div.style: position: absolute; left: 0px; top: 0px; z-index: 100001; background-color: rgb(170, 170, 170); opacity: 0.5; display: none;

div.p: Welcome to Anderson School District Two's website. To learn more about our district, check out our Mission / Vision page. Curious where your one cent sales tax goes? Take a look at Your Penny at Work, where we are always adding new projects we've been able to complete thanks to your penny.
This is where staff can find all of their relevant information.
Welcome Parents! We are excited about our new webpage. If you cannot find the information you are looking for, please give us a call. We will be happy to assist.

nav.div: Anderson School District Two » Parents » Family & Student Support during COVID-19

h2.span: The schools will remain close until April 30! From Tuesday, March 24 until April 30

strong.span: We want to support you and your family during this challenging time. Anderson Two been approved to distribute free lunch/breakfast at the following locations:

span.a: Self-Help Parenting Tips - Surviving the Shutdown
Talking to Your Child About The Coronavirus
Scholastic - Talking to Kids about the Coronavirus
Sheila the Brave - Helping Your Child Deal with Their Feelings
Ready Rosie - Staying Healthy at Home
Sheila the Brave - Helping Your Child Deal with Their Feelings
Autism & COVID-19 - English & Spanish - COVID-19 Explained
Helping Children Cope With Changes from COVID-19

a.title: Looking for some new ideas for places to read while social distancing?

span.a: Looking for some new ideas for places to read while social distancing?
Foothills Gymnastics and Cheer Center - Daily Home Activities for Kids

strong.span: Weekly lesson plans, fun music, fun activities for children and more.
The code for that Google Classroom page is : o5rlsbl
SC THRIVE - 1-800-726-8774 (Call to apply for SNAP, Medicaid, TANF, Veteran’s Benefits)

span.a: SC THRIVE - File Taxes on-line for Free
Family Connection - Family Support and Virus Updates
Hospice of the Upstate - Response to Referrals
Family Voices - Focus on family engagement & keeping children healthy

strong.span: All Field Trips/School Events through April 30th
4K Screenings - Postponed until a later date
